mapper.select: WITH filtered_trades AS ( SELECT * FROM ${scheme}.user_trade_history WHERE page_type = ${pageType} AND LOWER(concat('0x', encode("account", 'hex'))) = LOWER(#{account}) ) SELECT id, account, page_type, action, cancel, amount_point, amount_token, amount_value, fee_point, fee_token, fee_value, currency, balance_point, balance_token, coalesce(purchase_id, '') as purchase_id, CASE WHEN payment_id IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(payment_id, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS payment_id, CASE WHEN shop_id IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(shop_id, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS shop_id, block_number, block_timestamp, CASE WHEN transaction_hash IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(transaction_hash, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS transaction_hash FROM filtered_trades ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT ${pageSize} OFFSET (${pageNumber} - 1) * ${pageSize};

WITH filtered_trades AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ${scheme}.user_trade_history WHERE page_type = ${pageType} AND LOWER(concat('0x', encode("account", 'hex'))) = LOWER(#{account}) ) SELECT total_count as "totalCount", CEIL(CAST(total_count AS FLOAT) / ${pageSize}) AS "totalPages" FROM filtered_trades;

WITH filtered_trades AS ( SELECT * FROM ${scheme}.user_un_payable_trade_history WHERE LOWER(concat('0x', encode("phone", 'hex'))) = LOWER(#{phone}) ) SELECT CASE WHEN phone IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(phone, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS phone, action, amount, balance, coalesce(purchase_id, '') as purchase_id, CASE WHEN shop_id IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(shop_id, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS shop_id, block_number, block_timestamp, CASE WHEN transaction_hash IS NOT NULL THEN LOWER(concat('0x', encode(transaction_hash, 'hex'))) ELSE null END AS transaction_hash FROM filtered_trades ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC LIMIT ${pageSize} OFFSET (${pageNumber} - 1) * ${pageSize};

WITH filtered_trades AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ${scheme}.user_un_payable_trade_history WHERE LOWER(concat('0x', encode("phone", 'hex'))) = LOWER(#{phone}) ) SELECT total_count as "totalCount", CEIL(CAST(total_count AS FLOAT) / ${pageSize}) AS "totalPages" FROM filtered_trades;
